txt.en: 'In my excitement over the news of the revenge wrought in my father's name, I forgot to tell you I was reassigned to an outpost south-east of Iridír along the dry river near the Crossing of Sílabal, also called the Wrackwade. I will leave as soon as I am prepared.\n\n'Should you find yourself in the encampment there, visit me. I will treat you to a meal and a smoke.'
Raphûz was gone in the morning, having headed south to the Wrackwade. Find him there to see how he fares.
Speak with Raphûz at his post in Wrackwade
Raphûz informed you he must move south along the dry river to a place called the Crossing of Sílabal or the Wrackwade. He wants to sit and speak with you again.
'Let us enjoy the night while we can. Tomorrow will take me further into these lands, and who is to know my fate.'

'Did you see? She is as beautiful and free as she appeared from a distance. She thanked us for caring for and nursing her fawn back to health. My friend, I confess I am at a loss for words. She said 'Khûd Zagin, the land to the south.' I must consult with the people of this camp and learn their ways.\n\n'I would very much like to speak with her again.'
Complete the Instance: A New Post
Raphûz wants to sit with you and discuss over a smoke and food about all that has transpired since his arrival in the Ikorbân Valley.
